public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
Defines the format of the database Defines the login screen and the output of the print-out screen.

  • 方法详细资料

    • login

      public static UserData login​(java.lang.String... args)
      Write the data into the Data.json file and arrange them neatly in a fixed format for easy viewing
      参数:
      args - This data represents the Xth array of data in the Data.json file
      返回:
      Returns a string converted to a JAVA entity class

    • loginCheck

      public static void loginCheck​(UserData ud, java.lang.String msg)
      When logging in by entering bookingNum, determine if the bookingNum entered at login is correct
      参数:
      ud - The value of a particular set of data in the database
      msg - Prompt in alert when login error occurs

    • initialSeatPage

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> initialSeatPage()
      Generate a file with flight information
      返回:
      Return the seat code of the selected seat

    • overlapImage

      public static void overlapImage​(java.net.URL backgroundPath, java.lang.String message, java.lang.String outPutPath, int x, int y, int fontSize) throws java.io.IOException
      Creating a page background using URL
      参数:
      backgroundPath - Path to the background image
      message - Text message on page
      outPutPath - Output path
      x - x width
      y - y height
      fontSize - font size
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - Image failed to load

    • overlapImage

    • overlapImage

      public static void overlapImage​(java.net.URL backgroundPath, java.lang.String message, java.lang.String outPutPath, int x, int y, int fontSize, java.awt.Color c) throws java.io.IOException
      Creating a page background
      参数:
      backgroundPath - Path to the background image
      message - Text message on page
      outPutPath - Output path
      x - Width
      y - Length
      fontSize - Font size
      c - color
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - when image failed to load

    • overlapImage

      public static void overlapImage​(java.lang.String backgroundPath, java.lang.String message, java.lang.String outPutPath, int x, int y, int fontSize, java.awt.Color c) throws java.io.IOException
      a overload method for overlap image
      参数:
      backgroundPath - path of background
      message - message to print
      outPutPath - path of output image
      x - x width
      y - y height
      fontSize - size of font
      c - color
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - when there are any exceptions

    • printBoarding

      public static void printBoarding​(java.lang.String[] str) throws java.io.IOException
      Print the user's detailed flight data on the boarding.png
      参数:
      str - An array in the database
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - Error loading images or data
